page.content: FAMILY SURVEY RESULTS OF A SURVEY OF LIFESTYLE OF 100FAMILIES WITH CHILDRE AT BLACKTHORNS PRIMARY SCHOOL ,LINDFIELD.RESULTS GIVEN ARE %OF REPLIES.1)WHERE WERE YOU BORN?
